Hours & Location

HOLIDAY DINING HOURS AT HANK'S 
Hanksgiving | 2:00 pm–7:00 pmChristmas Eve | 1:00 pm–8:00 pmChristmas Day | ClosedNew Year's Eve | 4:00 pm–10:00 pmNew Year's Day | Closed
VALET PARKING: 
Available during dinner service Tuesday-Saturday for $10 and is located at the main entrance on Gay Street.

About

Hank’s is a classic institution that emanates the charm and warmth of Southern Hospitality. We are dedicated to preserving the culinary heritage of the lowcountry and fostering a convivial atmosphere where guests can feel at ease and fully savor their dining experience. Our long-standing reputation for excellence and commitment to quality have made us a beloved destination for locals and visitors alike, and we invite all to become part of the Hank’s family and experience the spirit and tradition that have kept us thriving for over 25 years.

Menu

As the original Hank’s Seafood in Charleston celebrates its 25th anniversary, the opening of the Columbus location marks a significant milestone in its storied history. Guests can enjoy the signature dishes that have made Hank's Seafood an iconic dining destination, as well as the high standard of quality they're known for, serving sustainably sourced seafood. Enjoy signature freshly caught dishes such as  the Seafood à la Wando, Jumbo Lump Crab Cocktail, Bouillabaisse and the pan seared daily fresh seafood alongside innovative cocktails and a buzzy atmosphere.
View Menus 
Gallery

Come on in and take a peek through our gallery of snapshots. Get a glimpse of our cozy dining room where you can kick back and enjoy good food with great company.
Learn More 
Meet Hank's Chef
FRANK MCMAHON 
At the heart of The Hanks Low Country Seafood & Raw Bar experience lies the culinary prowess of Frank McMahon. With a passion for seafood and a knack for flavor, Frank brings his expertise to the table as our visionary culinary leader. Drawing inspiration from Charleston's rich culinary heritage, Frank has meticulously crafted a menu that reflects the coastal flavors of the Lowcountry. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to quality, he has assembled a talented team to ensure that each dish served in Columbus embodies the same authentic taste and culinary excellence that has made the original Hanks Seafood a beloved institution in the South.

Happenings

Join us for exciting events and happenings from exclusive wine dinners to engaging cocktail classes or classic holiday brunches, our calendar is brimming with opportunities to experience all the facets of Hank’s. There's something for everyone to enjoy! Stay tuned about upcoming events by checking our calendar regularly, and be sure to reserve your spot early as they tend to fill up quickly.
Learn More 
Private Events

Looking for a venue for your next event or gathering? Nestled at the back of the restaurant is our Private Dining Room that comfortably seats up to 22 guests, making it perfect for intimate gatherings, business meetings, or special celebrations. Exclusively designed with a separate patio entrance, your guests can have easy access and added privacy.

Let our team help you plan the perfect menu and provide warm service throughout your time with us.
Learn More 
Neighborhood

Nestled at the vibrant intersection of High and Gay Street, Hank’s Low Country Seafood & Raw Bar finds our home in the heart of a dynamic neighborhood teeming with life. Here, residents, businesses, and visitors alike are treated to a mosaic of culinary, artistic, and retail experiences that ignite the senses and inspire the soul. In partnership with Edwards Companies, we are proud to contribute to the fabric of this thriving community, further enriching the vibrant tapestry of High and Gay Street with our dedication to culinary excellence and warm hospitality.

Visit Our Neighbors

Brass Eye

The energy, view, and drinks will give you the perfect outpost to unwind. Brass Eye rooftop bar is surrounded by oversized fireplaces, cozy seating, and panoramic views of the city. It is the perfect place to assemble with friends and enjoy well-crafted spirits and good times.
Learn More 
Little West Tavern

Our neighbor, Little West Tavern is a wood-hearth neighborhood tavern. Serving up spirited wood-fired fare alongside a variety of spirits, this local tavern makes finding what you want easy – day or night.
Learn More 
Maudine’s

This neighborhood coffee shop is where visitors can enjoy a variety of pastries, baked goods, and grab & go items. With house made syrups and friendly neighbor feel, Maudine’s is always ready to lend you some sugar.
Learn More 
Chouette

Nestled in the heart of Columbus, Chouette is a charming French bistro named after the French word for “owl” or “cool.” Our bistro beckons guests into a warm and inviting space that resonates with historical significance, seamlessly blending the allure of tradition with modern comfort. We pride ourselves on being an inviting and approachable place where guests of all backgrounds feel at home. Our menu is designed to introduce the richness of French cuisine to everyone, whether you’re a seasoned foodie or new to the world of French flavors.

About

Great food and a charming ambiance can only equal an extraordinary dining experience! Hank’s Seafood Restaurant is located in a turn-of-the-century warehouse overlooking the Charleston City Market.

Hank’s Seafood has been beautifully renovated to an ambiance that reflects Charleston’s port history and family roots.

Menu

For over 25 years, Hank's Seafood has been a beloved staple for both Charleston locals and visitors, offering the freshest local, sustainably sourced seafood. Guests can enjoy the signature dishes that have made Hank's Seafood an iconic dining destination, as well as the high standard of quality they're known for, serving sustainably sourced seafood. Enjoy signature freshly caught dishes such as  the Seafood à la Wando, Jumbo Lump Crab Cocktail, Bouillabaisse and the pan seared daily fresh seafood alongside innovative cocktails and a buzzy atmosphere.
View Menu 
Private Events
THE ULTIMATE GATHERING SPACES FOR PRIVATE EVENTS IN CHARLESTON’S HISTORIC DISTRICT 
We are proud to offer the award-winning cuisine and service of Hank’s Seafood Restaurant in our private loft above the restaurant, Hank’s Loft, and at our newly created venue, Hank’s Social Hall.

Let our team curate a memorable dining experience for any type of occasion, whether gathering with friends and family, hosting a corporate event, or holiday party.
Learn More 
Happenings

Come join us for some incredible events and unforgettable experiences! Our calendar is packed with the best happenings in Charleston. Stay tuned about upcoming events by checking our calendar regularly, and be sure to reserve your spot early as they tend to fill up quickly.
Learn More 
Hank's Loft

Hank’s Loft, our stunning apartment in downtown Charleston features vaulted ceilings, exposed brick walls, a private billiard table, a chef inspired kitchen and the amenities of a full service upscale hotel.
Learn More 
Gallery
TAKE A LOOK INSIDE HANK’S SEAFOOD RESTAURANT 
Voted Best Seafood Restaurant in Charleston for 20 years running!
View Gallery 
Meet Hank's Chef
TIM RICHARDSON, EXECUTIVE CHEF 
Like many chefs, South Carolina native Tim Richardson gravitated to the kitchen as a teenager. Richardson spent several years learning the restaurant business at locally owned steak houses in Columbia, S.C., before discovering his niche at Twigs, a charming restaurant located in Blowing Rock, North Carolina. Under the tutelage of Twigs Chef Ryan Brevda, Richardson honed his appreciation for preparing high quality ingredients and crafting a fine dining experience.

To further refine his culinary skills, Richardson relocated in 2001 to Charleston, S.C., where he enrolled in Johnson & Wales University and began mentoring at Hank’s Seafood Restaurant under founding Chef Frank McMahon. Today, Richardson’s culinary talent, passion for fresh seafood, and dedication to all aspects of running a restaurant serve him well as Executive Chef of Hank’s Seafood Restaurant, a role he earned after many successful years as the restaurant’s Chef de Cuisine. Tim recently was a finalist for Charleston’s best chef as voted by readers of The Post & Courier, Charleston’s Choice Awards.

Hank's Classic Recipes
FROM OUR KITCHEN TO YOURS 
Celebrating 25 years of delivering Southern hospitality and carefully crafted artisan dishes. Chef Tim has pulled Hank’s most memorable recipes from the archives for you to create at home.
Learn More 
Friend's of Hank's

EXCLUSIVE HOTEL OFFERS FOR YOUR CHARLESTON STAY

Within steps of Hank’s Seafood Restaurant are two luxury hotels with exclusive offers for friends of Hank’s.

For the curious traveler, enjoy a stay at Emeline, a clever and thoughtfully designed boutique hotel retreat crafted for those charting their own course.

Looking for a lively oasis off Meeting Street? The Ryder is a place to embrace your fun-loving, free-spirited side.

About

Great food and a charming ambiance can only equal an extraordinary dining experience! Hank’s Seafood Restaurant is located in a turn-of-the-century warehouse overlooking the Charleston City Market.

Hank’s Seafood has been beautifully renovated to an ambiance that reflects Charleston’s port history and family roots.

Menu

For over 25 years, Hank's Seafood has been a beloved staple for both Charleston locals and visitors, offering the freshest local, sustainably sourced seafood. Guests can enjoy the signature dishes that have made Hank's Seafood an iconic dining destination, as well as the high standard of quality they're known for, serving sustainably sourced seafood. Enjoy signature freshly caught dishes such as  the Seafood à la Wando, Jumbo Lump Crab Cocktail, Bouillabaisse and the pan seared daily fresh seafood alongside innovative cocktails and a buzzy atmosphere.
View Menu

THE ULTIMATE GATHERING SPACES FOR PRIVATE EVENTS IN CHARLESTON’S HISTORIC DISTRICT 
We are proud to offer the award-winning cuisine and service of Hank’s Seafood Restaurant in our private loft above the restaurant, Hank’s Loft, and at our newly created venue, Hank’s Social Hall.

Let our team curate a memorable dining experience for any type of occasion, whether gathering with friends and family, hosting a corporate event, or holiday party.

Meet Hank's Chef
TIM RICHARDSON, EXECUTIVE CHEF 
Like many chefs, South Carolina native Tim Richardson gravitated to the kitchen as a teenager. Richardson spent several years learning the restaurant business at locally owned steak houses in Columbia, S.C., before discovering his niche at Twigs, a charming restaurant located in Blowing Rock, North Carolina. Under the tutelage of Twigs Chef Ryan Brevda, Richardson honed his appreciation for preparing high quality ingredients and crafting a fine dining experience.

To further refine his culinary skills, Richardson relocated in 2001 to Charleston, S.C., where he enrolled in Johnson & Wales University and began mentoring at Hank’s Seafood Restaurant under founding Chef Frank McMahon. Today, Richardson’s culinary talent, passion for fresh seafood, and dedication to all aspects of running a restaurant serve him well as Executive Chef of Hank’s Seafood Restaurant, a role he earned after many successful years as the restaurant’s Chef de Cuisine. Tim recently was a finalist for Charleston’s best chef as voted by readers of The Post & Courier, Charleston’s Choice Awards.
